form.label: CIP-004 R2: Cyber Security Training
form.description: Each Responsible Entity shall implement one or more cyber security training program(s) appropriate to individual roles, functions, or responsibilities that collectively includes each of the applicable requirement parts in CIP-004-6 Table R2 â€“ Cyber Security Training Program.

search.query: | inputlookup cip_training_materials | search is_available="TRUE" | eval last_update_epoch=strptime(last_update, "%m/%d/%Y"), last_30_days_epoch=relative_time(now(), "-30d@d"), updated_in_last_30_days=if(last_update_epoch>=last_30_days_epoch, 1, 0) | stats count as course_count by updated_in_last_30_days
| inputlookup cip_distribution_lists | eval members=split(members, "|") | mvexpand members | dedup members sortby members | fields members
| inputlookup cip_distribution_lists | sort distribution_list_name | fields distribution_list_name

p.h1: R2.2: Require completion of the training specified in Part 2.1 prior to granting authorized electronic access and authorized unescorted physical access to applicable Cyber Assets

panel.title: Remote Access by Users with Expired Certifications

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.app="win:remote" AND Authentication.src!="localhost" AND [| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | eval Authentication.dest=nt_host | fields Authentication.dest ] by _time,Authentication.src,Authentication.user,Authentication.dest,Authentication.action,Authentication.app span=1s | `drop_dm_object_name("Authentication")` | join type=left user [| `get_cip_training_and_members` | search State="REQUIRED" members=$individual_tok|s$ distribution_list_name=$group_tok|s$ | join type=left members,title [| inputlookup cip_training_records.csv | eval members=user | fields members,score,completed_date,title,next_certification_date ] | eval next_three_months=relative_time(now(), "+3mon@day"), next_certification_epoch=strptime(next_certification_date, "%m/%d/%Y"), today_now=now() | eval cert_state=if(next_certification_epoch <= next_three_months, if(today_now >= next_certification_epoch, "Expired", "Approaching Renewal"), "Good") | rex field=members "(?<user>[^@]+)" | search cert_state="Expired" | fields user,cert_state,distribution_list_name ] | search cert_state="Expired" | `get_cip_info_by_hostname(dest, "dest")` | `get_cip_info_by_dns(src, "src")` | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | table _time,src,dest,dest_site_id,dest_zone,dest_asset_type,user,distribution_list_name,action,app | rename src as Source, user as User, dest as Destination, action as Result,app as App, distribution_list_name as Group, dest_site_id as Facility, dest_zone as "ESP Zone", dest_asset_type as "Asset Type" | sort -_time

p.h1: R2.3: Require completion of the training specified at least once every 15 calendar months.

panel.title: Certifications Expired or Expiring in the next 3 Months

search.query: | `get_cip_training_and_members` | search State="REQUIRED" members=$individual_tok|s$ distribution_list_name=$group_tok|s$ | fields members, title | join type=left members,title [| inputlookup cip_training_records.csv | eval members=user | fields members,score,completed_date,title,next_certification_date ] | eval next_three_months=relative_time(now(), "+3mon@day"), next_certification_epoch=strptime(next_certification_date, "%m/%d/%Y"), today_now=now() | eval cert_state=if(next_certification_epoch <= next_three_months, if(today_now >= next_certification_epoch, "Expired", "Approaching Renewal"), "Good") | search cert_state="Expired" OR cert_state="Approaching Renewal" | table members,title,next_certification_date,cert_state | sort -cert_state | rename members as User, title as Title, completed_date as "Completed Date", score as Score, next_certification_date as "Renewal Date", cert_state as "State"

| `get_cip_training_and_members` | search State="REQUIRED" members=$individual_tok|s$ distribution_list_name=$group_tok|s$ | fields members, title | join type=left members,title [| inputlookup cip_training_records.csv | eval members=user | fields members,score,completed_date,title ] | eval completed_epoch=strptime(completed_date, "%m/%d/%Y") | addinfo | eval max_time=if(info_max_time ="+Infinity", now(), info_max_time) | where completed_epoch>= info_min_time AND completed_epoch <= max_time | sort completed_epoch, members | table members,title,completed_date,score | rename members as User, title as Title, completed_date as "Completed Date", score as Score
